name: Arktonis 13
description:
Arktonis 13 is an immersive first person puzzle game with focus on story and visuals.

Arktonis 13 is a lonely planet that no one survives for long. A good place for “The Company” to establish a laboratory for secret experiments.

You are Ashton, a mechanic who is the only one left on Arktonis13. Normally, your job is to keep the Lab clean and to assist a sophisticated AI that is experimenting with time. But something went terribly wrong...

Features
  • Change time to escape a hostile environment
  • High-End graphics
  • Immersive environment
  • Diversified gameplay
FAQ

1. Will this game receive additional content?
Yes, a final Chapter will follow.  Still there are a lot of sounds and hints missing.

2. Is there any Support?
Not guaranteed, as we do not have the resources, but you can leave a message on our itch.io page and we will try to help you as soon as possible. 
We appreciate your feedback! 

3. I have performance issues
Arktonis 13 is not optimized for weaker PCs yet. Minimum for 1080p is a GTX 970 or better. 1 GB GPU-Ram or better is highly recommended. Try with reduced resolution if you experience performance issues.

4. I cannot setup Sound-Volumes
These options are currently placeholders. 

5. Is there a release date?
We plan to release the complete game on January 12th, 2021. 

The next demo will be uploaded on December 11th, 2020.

6. Do you support other platforms?
We do Support Linux but cannot upload here currently due to size limitations. Here you find the latest build(s): https://tinyurl.com/arktonis13
